title: New Updates to Carolingian UI!
content:
After gathering feedback for Folders and Search in Scene Navigation, I've made some modifications:

  • Added folder tree to the navigation. This way, you can go back and forth between subfolders without reopening the folder list.
  • Some users did not understand that 'Favorites' was Foundry's default navigation. I changed back the naming and icon to avoid confusion.
  • Retained folder list open/closed state in a same session (resets on reload)

Keep the feedback coming! More on Github repo or Discord
